subject: Returning Plus X Pedals - Order #SSN5642
description_text:
Hello! 

I got my brother these pedals for Christmas for his sim rig. He has an Xbox and I have a PC and he wanted these pedals because he used mine.. Well I did not check if they were compatible with Xbox and something told me to check when I got them out of the box.. I can provide pictures if youâ€™d like but they were unused / unmounted and only taken out of the box. I can send everything back in the original packaging. 

Thank you, 
Nate

conversations.body_text: Has not been resolved but I went ahead and sent a new email and hoping for a new ticket
